verses.verse: In that day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be a fountain <S%H4726><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> for sin <S%H2403><s%> and for uncleanness <S%H5079><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, that I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of the idols <S%H6091><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>, and they shall no more be remembered <S%H2142><s%>: and also I will cause the prophets <S%H5030><s%> and the unclean <S%H2932><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H376><s%>, that when any shall yet prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, then his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> that fathered <S%H3205><s%> him shall say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H2421><s%>, You shall not live; for you speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> that fathered <S%H3205><s%> him shall thrust <S%H1856><s%> him through when he prophesies <S%H5012><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that the prophets <S%H5030><s%> shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> of his vision <S%H2384><s%>, when he has prophesied <S%H5012><s%>; neither shall they wear <S%H3847><s%> a rough <S%H8181><s%> garment <S%H155><s%> to deceive <S%H3584><s%>:
But he shall say <S%H559><s%>, I am no prophet <S%H5030><s%>, I am a husbandman <S%H5647><s%>; for man <S%H120><s%> taught me to keep cattle <S%H7069><s%> from my youth <S%H5271><s%>.

And one shall say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H4347><s%>, What are these wounds in your hands <S%H3027><s%>? Then he shall answer <S%H559><s%>, Those with which I was wounded <S%H5221><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of my friends <S%H157><s%>.

Awake <S%H5782><s%>, O sword <S%H2719><s%>, against my shepherd <S%H7462><s%>, and against the man <S%H1397><s%> that is my fellow <S%H5997><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: strike <S%H5221><s%> the shepherd <S%H7462><s%>, and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> shall be scattered <S%H6327><s%>: and I will turn <S%H7725><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the little ones <S%H6819><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H776><s%>, that in all the land, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> parts <S%H6310><s%> in it shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> and die <S%H1478><s%>; but the third <S%H7992><s%> shall be left in it <S%H3498><s%>.

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> the third part <S%H7992><s%> through the fire <S%H784><s%>, and will refine <S%H6884><s%> them as silver <S%H3701><s%> is refined <S%H6884><s%>, and will try <S%H974><s%> them as gold <S%H2091><s%> is tried <S%H974><s%>: they shall call <S%H7121><s%> on my name <S%H8034><s%>, and I will hear <S%H6030><s%> them <S%H559><s%>: I will say, It is my people <S%H5971><s%>: and they shall say <S%H559><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is my God <S%H430><s%>.
